channel.title: Verinia - Experience Perfection of the Past
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dqIRMdm.gif[/img]
Verinia will be a complete Runescape-Remake. We strive for perfection, and do not accept anything but excellence on our part. The developers Vip3r, Ethan will be going in overtime to make this the best Runescape-Remake it can possibly be, and continue the legacy that Emperor and Vexia started. This is Verinia, Experience the Perfection.
World 1 : 498
Information: -World 1 is a RuneScape Remake (Economy Sever) -World 2 is a Pking based land (Pking Server)
[U][B]Server Media: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yIG5rcM.png[/img] [/B][/U]
[U][B]Website Media:[/B][/U] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GemqtbK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4aHQWf2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9M1zOtt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bdw98Rj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VeeaqPD.png[/img]
[B][U]We Look foward to seeing you on Verinia![/U][/B]
[U][B]Links:[/B][/U] [url=http://Verinia.com/]Verinia Home[/url] [URL=http://"http://Verinia.com/forums"]Verinia Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.verinia.com/VeriniaGameClient.jar"]Play Now[/URL]
[U][B]Credits:[/B][/U] Vexia Emperor
[/CENTER]

item.title: Verinia - Experience Perfection of the Past
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

I don’t understand the point of a compete Runescape remake, that’s why I joined rsps; to get away from Runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Verinia - Experience Perfection of the Past
item.dc:creator: @pumpklins pumpklins
item.description:
@pumpklins wrote:

Bump! There’s also events where donators donate $3-5 and activate events which last an hr, these include double xp, double catch whilst fishing, increased drop rate, double gains whilst woodcutting, etc. There’s usually a few events everyday and are global to every player regardless of who donates.

Read full topic
